pullrequest.title: Add startup script for handsim with APL arm

content.raw:
noting here that currently on handsim and handsim-proprietary/default, the arm spawns in the right position but immediately bends its fingers in an interesting position...

![hand-10-31-14.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/rnoXja/images/3082976424-hand-10-31-14.png)
I've verified that this is not a problem with the startup script, however, and may be fixed by future joint torque tweaks.
content.html:
noting here that currently on handsim and handsim-proprietary/default, the arm spawns in the right position but immediately bends its fingers in an interesting position...

I've verified that this is not a problem with the startup script, however, and may be fixed by future joint torque tweaks.
